package_required_desc: Pro přístup na tuto stránku je třeba si nainstalovat níže uvedené potřebné balíčky

ftp.title: FTP
ftp.ftp_is_disabled_desc: Pro zapnutí klikněte na tlačítko níže
ftp.user_not_found_desc: Kliknutím na tlačítko níže vytvoříte první

virtualhost.title: Virtuální hostitelé
virtualhost.name: Název
virtualhost.Trusted_Network_Only: Umožnit přístup pouze z důvěryhodných sítí
virtualhost.automatic_HostRecord_creation: Host name aliases are added to System > Dashboard > Hostname / Alias
virtualhost.dnsHostRecord_do_not_be_removed: Host name aliases in System > Dashboard > Hostname / Alias are preserved
virtualhost.Must_be_inferior_than_MemoryLimit: Must be smaller than 'Script memory limit'
virtualhost.Must_be_inferior_than_PostMaxSize: Must be smaller than 'Maximum post size'
virtualhost.Not_valid_MaxExecutionTime: Neplatná hodnota nejdelší přijatelné doby pro vykonávání
virtualhost.alert_php_not_installed_title: Verze PHP, kterou jste vybrali, není nainstalovaná.
virtualhost.alert_php_upgrade_php_detail: You are strongly encouraged to use another PHP version, this software collection is not maintained anymore.

docs.path-and-virtual-host-rules: If you want to create a resource path matching rule, then enter the resource path beginning with a '/'. If you want to create a web site name matching rule, then type the web site fully qualified domain name.
docs.MaxExecutionTime: This sets the maximum time in seconds a script is allowed to run before it is terminated by the parser.
docs.MemoryLimit: This sets the maximum amount of memory in bytes that a script is allowed to allocate, this value must be larger than the 'Maximum post size'.
docs.PostMaxSize: Sets max size of post data allowed. This setting also affects file upload. To upload large files, this value must be larger than 'Upload maximum file size'.
docs.UploadMaxFilesize: The maximum size of an uploaded file, this value must be smaller than the 'Maximum post size'.
docs.Websocket-label: Experimental feature. The WebSocket API is an advanced technology that allows to open a two-way interactive communication session between the user's browser and the server.
docs.WebSocketsPath-label: Additional match rule based on the WebSocket URL path

validation.valid_fqdn: Must be a valid FQDN like 'server.domain.org', one item per line
validation.valid_fqdn_already_used: Tento název virtuálního hostitele už je používán
validation.key_already_exists: Virtuální hostitel se stejným názvem už existuje
validation.hostname_key_exists: The Virtual host names (FQDN) is already used
validation.valid_hostname_fqdn_1_922337203685477580: Must be a valid FQDN like 'server.domain.org', one item per line
validation.ValidFromCIDR_validator: Must be a valid CIDR like '10.10.10.0/16', one item per line
validation.Invalid_Target: Je třeba, aby byla platná URL adresa, jako např. „http://domain.com“
validation.user_already_exists: Účet s tímto uživatelským jménem už existuje
validation.valid_username: Je třeba, aby první znak bylo písmeno, pak pouze malá písmena, číslice a symboly jako „-“ a „_“
validation.valid_hostname_0_9223372036854775807: Must be a fully qualified domain name or a resource path segment beginning with '/'
validation.WebSocketsPathNotValid: Only letters, digits and the symbols - (minus) _ (underscore) are accepted

proxypass.vhost_name_help: A valid fully qualified domain name
proxypass.CIDR_Comma_Sperated_List: Empty or a CIDR comma separated list
proxypass.NoDataToDisplay: Reverzní proxy přeposílá požadavky HTTP klientů na jiný webový server
proxypass.dnsHostRecord_do_not_be_removed: The host name alias in System > Dashboard > Hostname / Alias is preserved
proxypass.automatic_HostRecord_creation: An host name alias is added to System > Dashboard > Hostname / Alias
